text_content: Solar Foods is making headlines with their new factory that produces Solein, a protein made from air and electricity! This groundbreaking technology could revolutionize sustainable food systems. Our long-read article dives deep into the promise of air-based protein, its environmental and economic impacts, and the challenges of scaling up this innovative approach. Is this the future of food?
